title: P.V.E. SKY SURVIVAL
briefDescription: In this map you have to kill mobs for you survival. The map comes with an addon which changes the loot tables of the mobs ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this map you have to kill mobs for you survival. The map comes with an addon which changes the loot tables of the mobs and makes the ender dragon fight possible. It is a hard skyblock challenge so you can bring friends to help you, as the map is multiplayer friendly. It also has a spawn, custom items, and a mob called loot chicken which will help you progress faster.
Every island has a spawner, so get blocks and start expanding.

title: TNT Spleef
briefDescription: This is a classic spleef map that has up to three layers and 5 different power ups for you too choose from. You can configure the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a classic spleef map that has up to three layers and 5 different power ups for you too choose from. You can configure the settings for it too be day/ night, the amount of layers (1,2 or 3) and whether tile drops are on or off. You can play with your friends or practise on your own in the lobby with a mini spleef and jumps on varing distance.
I?ve spend a lot of time decorating the arena so it looks nice. The five different power ups are knock back sword, speed, flame bow, invisibility or ender pearls. I hope you download and enjoy this map!

title: Libbywolf1617?s Mansion
briefDescription: This is a map made for my friend. It is a mansion with a lot of space. We have a complete interior but feel free ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a map made for my friend. It is a mansion with a lot of space. We have a complete interior but feel free to decorate it and change anything i hope you enjoy. This map has space for a lot of activity and would be perfect for role play with your friends.
The mansion comes fully furnished with four floors as well as a basement with a bar,game room,art room,toilets and a laundry room for parties and hangout or if u just want to do some fun art. The first floor has a kitchen, dinning room, living room, office and a chill zone as well as a indoor pool with changing rooms for some relaxing chill out fun with friends. where as the second floor has four bedroom a master bedroom with an office and two bathrooms it also has balcony?s and a library. On the third floor there is four bedrooms two storage rooms and one bathroom as well as a balcony. In the attic there is one bedroom and a party room.
Outside the mansion consist of a pool with a Jacuzzi and bar for outdoor parties, as well as a tennis court a basket ball court for the athletic type and a aquarium with beautiful animals. Woodland, farm and a camping area as well as ponds with a waterfall you can stand on top of for a beautiful view.
So download this map today and maybe use it for a role-play lol

title: DodgeBow (MCC REMAKE OF DODGEBOLT)
briefDescription: Dodgebow, A Recreation of an already existing mini game called "Dodge Bolt" where only Youtubers could compete, I remade this game for those who weren't ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Dodgebow, A Recreation of an already existing mini game called ?Dodge Bolt? where only Youtubers could compete, I remade this game for those who weren?t Youtubers and could enjoy ?Dodgebolt? with their friends. The goal is simple; to eliminate the other team using weapons and blocks that will be given to you to help defeat the other opponent. Arrows can penetrate walls, Bows with the strongest accuracy. Bring home the victory in a battle for glory!
This game REQUIRES 2+ players and the max is 8 players, if there are any bugs please report them in the comments. This isnt as good as MCC, but its the closest I can get to.
Not only have I recreated this from MCC, but added custom ?game modes? which can differ the game play and add a new whole category of fun! The current ?gamemodes? are build mode, infinite arrows, Swap mode(coming soon) and magic rod!
How to play:
When you spawn into the world, you need 2-8 players to actually start the game. If this is your first time logging into the world, you must re-select the maps and game modes. After everyone is ready, step onto the red square to start the game,

Once the Square turns green, the game will start in 3 seconds.
When you first get onto the map, you will receive a bow with no arrows. That is because each team will get 1 arrow, summoned at the black rectangle. Shoot wisely!

If your team mate dies, your team will receive an arrow at the rectangle.
If an arrow hits the wall, it will get teleported to the middle.
If an arrow falls into lava, it will get teleported to the middle.
Once everyone is eliminated on the opposing team, it will announce your team as the winner and teleport everyone back to spawn!
(ps its gonna lag a little since its resetting everything)
Build Mode ? Build the fort you desire and take advantage of it against your opponent!
Infinite Arrows ? Never run out of arrows again!
Swap Mode (coming soon) ? Swap with a random on the opponent team
Magic Rod (can only be used in Fish Burnout) ? Suck your opponents into lava using a rod!
P.S: I am going to add more maps and more game modes!
Currently there are 2 maps built, the official MCC map and a custom one so you dont get bored of playing the same map!
Classic ?
Fish Burnout ?

crawledImageUrls.text:
Spleef is a minigame where you have to destroy the snow blocks beneath other players to make them fall into the void with your diamond shovel. Be the last player standing to win
How to Play:
Your goal is to destroy the snow blocks beneath other players to make them fall into the void with your diamond shovel. Be the last player standing to win
NOTE: minimum of players is 1 and max is 30

title: Parkour Story Mode
briefDescription: Every Minecraft player had to do some parkour while playing MInecraft. If it's in their world or a world they downloaded, we have done some ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Every Minecraft player had to do some parkour while playing MInecraft. If it?s in their world or a world they downloaded, we have done some parkour in our Minecraft lives. In this world you start off by doing a parkour at a tree and ending off at the celebration of the defeating the Ender dragon.
This is just like any box world. Only this one has a little story to it.
This is a 30 level world. Every level is in a 7?7 box. You will start off at the bottom and make your way to the top to move on to the next level. The 1st box is a tree, then you will move on to finding diamonds fighting the wither and the Ender dragon and end off celebrating. There will be more boxes like a biome explorer box and a trading hall box.
You will spawn with the saturation effect. This will make it so if you fall and take damage, you don?t have to eat in order to get more health.
Some Nether boxes have lava and all end boxes have a void. If you die at levels 1-10, you will re spawn at level 1. If you die at level 11-30 you will re spawn at level 11 so be careful.
There are three levels where you need a bow. When you get to level 14 ?get the skulls? you will get a bow and arrow. The bow has infinity, you will need to keep the bow for levels 17, ?Wither fight? and level 25 ?dragon fight?.
You will be given op just in case you want to look around or if you keep dying and want to move on.
My next world will be a Minekart Wii (Mariokart Wii) Just for a shout out.
Thank you Flipndip257 for play testing. His worlds are 2-d Minecraft and captive minecraft.
Special youtuber: Mr.Beast gaming

Use cameras to control all movements of the animatronics around the restaurant.

title: Flying Ship
briefDescription: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to sail on a flying pirate ship in Minecraft? If so, this is the map for ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to sail on a flying pirate ship in Minecraft? If so, this is the map for you. It is a command block creation.
How to use:
Click the button that says ?If you want to sail the boat click here?
A netherite helmet with appear in your hotbar. DO NOT GO INTO THAT HOTBAR SLOT
Then, go up to the ship and ride in the minecart.
Now, go into the hotbar slot with the netherite helmet.
The ship will begin moving.
When you turn your head, the ship moves in that direction.
You can also go vertically by looking up or down
*This works with multiple players as long as only 1 person presses the button
Images were taken with natural mystic shaders
Here is my youtube video about it for more information: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-3rs1uD0aw

title: How Well Do You Know Me? (Minigame) (3-6 players)
briefDescription: How well do you know me? is a game that brings friends closer. You and up to 5 friends ask each other questions and whoever gets ...

crawledImageUrls.text: How well do you know me? is a game that brings friends closer. You and up to 5 friends ask each other questions and whoever gets them right wins! (Recommended players 3-6)

There are five players and one QuizMaster. The QuizMasters job is to ask the players questions about them self. If a player answers the question wrong, they get dropped into a lava pit and are out until there is one player left.

title: Timed Parkour Practice
briefDescription: A simple map that times you as you practice parkour. It's all about getting used to the course and getting the best time you possibly ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A simple map that times you as you practice parkour. It?s all about getting used to the course and getting the best time you possibly can whilst improving your parkour skills!
The course is short yet difficult, from slime jumps to trapdoors to strafing, it?s jam-packed with all sorts of parkour styles for you to both time and perfect your run on! I tried my hardest to fit in all sorts of themes and styles, with the only real one not showing up being ladder jumps (though I might include them in a sequel or future update teehee)
